name: JunkRats
description:
A side-scrolling game made for JamCraft!

Collect rat-sized car parts and make a custom car in the cardboard garage. Look carefully since some things are harder to find than others! 

WARNING: There's currently no way to go back to the junkyard from the rat garage. so make sure you're actually ready to build before you go in! (I'm so sorry)

Unfortunately it didn't quite get finished, but it should be playable.  Will definitely look at adding more to this in the future.

Controls:

Arrows: Movement

Space:Jump

Most of the art was conceived by the talented Micheal Smith 

The sounds used for this are sourced from opengameart.org by @jalastram, @wyver9, and  Little Robot Sound Factory respectively.
